title: Manchester City plan warm-weather training camp | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The derby against Manchester United has been postponed owing to the EFL Cup final, which gives City an unexpected window of opportunity. Guardiola - who enjoyed similar trips with Barcelona and Bayern Munich - had decided not to take his players away when given the choice by club bosses last month. But this extended period without a match has altered his thinking, with City due to definitely choose to go or not in the coming days. Manchester City stars and staff will be looking forward to the possibility of escaping the cold Former manager Manuel Pellegrini was criticised following a similar break two years ago, when they arrived back home a day before being dumped out of the FA Cup by Middlesbrough. Yet Guardiola is without a game for almost two weeks following the last-16 first leg, before a Premier League trip to Sunderland on March 5. That means there will be ample time to enjoy the heat before jetting back to the North West. RELATED ARTICLES
